meanings.definition: The ability of an organism to produce an immune response to a specific antigen.
meanings.sent1: The immunoreactivities of the body help fight off infections.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study immunoreactivities to understand how the immune system works.
meanings.sent3: The immunoreactivities of the superhero's suit made him invincible in battle.
meanings.sent4: Her immunoreactivities were like a shield protecting her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to explain immunoreactivities to the students.

meanings.definition: The presence of specific antibodies or antigens in a biological sample.
meanings.sent1: Doctors analyze immunoreactivities in blood samples to diagnose diseases.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician detected abnormal immunoreactivities in the patient's test results.
meanings.sent3: The detective found crucial evidence in the immunoreactivities of the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The immunoreactivities in the soil indicated the presence of harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's research focused on enhancing immunoreactivities in vaccines.
